properties.areaDesc: Waters from Savannah GA to Altamaha Sound GA extending from 20 nm to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 12 at 3:11PM EST until February 13 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and
seas 4 to 7 ft expected.

* WHERE...Savannah to Altamaha Sound from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 PM EST THURSDAY
